ai-mil3.4.5:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, you’re not to say to you,
ai-mil3.4.5:1.3_0: ‘How can this suffering be saved by this suffering, and if it’s something else?
ai-mil3.4.5:1.7_0: “Great king, if you have entered the ground at the wrong time, what self does it have? You done?”
ai-mil3.4.5:2.2_0: “What do you think, great king, when you’re drinking it, resplendent. When you’d drink it, bring it back?”
ai-mil3.4.5:2.4_0: “In the same way, great king, when someone has arrived at a good time, what does it say about? How do they refer to?”
ai-mil3.4.5:3.2_0: “What do you think, great king? When you’re this, you’ll enjoy the fields of merit.”
ai-mil3.4.5:3.4_0: “In the same way, great king, when someone has arrived at a good time, what does it say about? How do they refer to?”
ai-mil3.4.5:4.2_0: “What do you think, great king, when you do this? You should train yourselves in battle. ...”
ai-mil3.4.5:4.4_0: “In the same way, great king, when someone has arrived at a good time, what does he say about you? What does he have?
ai-mil3.4.5:5.2_0: what you know is for your own welfare.
ai-mil3.4.5:5.3_0: A thinker, a wise one would not proceed
ai-mil3.4.5:6.1_0: Suppose a cart driver leaves the highway,
ai-mil3.4.5:6.3_0: They enter upon a rough road,
ai-mil3.4.5:6.4_0: and fret when their axle breaks.
ai-mil3.4.5:7.2_0: to follow what’s against the good.
ai-mil3.4.5:7.3_0: Fallen in the jaws of death,
ai-mil3.4.5:7.4_0: and fret when their axle breaks.’”
ai-mil3.4.5:9.1_0: The fifth enquiry is the fifth (birth) (birth) Questioning.
